message: Your share is decreasing faster than mine. Let's be fair and split a little more evenly this round.
I'll take a bit less, but still more than half
This offer is more than you would have gotten last round. The clock is ticking, and it's hurting you more than me.
You're right, time is against me. But I still want a bigger share
This is it - a perfectly even split.  Any more haggling and we both risk losing too much to inflation.  Let's be logical and end this now.
